titleStmt.title: [The flour of godly praiers] [most worthy to be vsed in these our daies for the sauegard, health, and comforte of all degrees, and estates / newlie made by Thomas Becon].
titleStmt.author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate, a lytle beneth S. Martins, these bokes are to be solde at hys shop by the lytle cunduite in Chepesyde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
